verses.verse: וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> thou shalt say בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> I אוֹדְךָ֣ <WH3034> I will praise יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אָנַ֖פְתָּ <WH599> thee though thou wast angry בִּ֑י יָשֹׁ֥ב <WH7725> is turned away אַפְּךָ֖ <WH639> with me thine anger וּֽתְנַחֲמֵֽנִי׃ <WH5162> and thou comfortedst

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אֵ֧ל <WH410> Behold God יְשׁוּעָתִ֛י <WH3444> [is] my salvation אֶבְטַ֖ח <WH982> I will trust וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֶפְחָ֑ד <WH6342> and not be afraid כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָזִּ֤י <WH5797> [is] my strength וְזִמְרָת֙ <WH2176> and [my] song יָ֣הּ <WH3050> for the LORD יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> JEHOVAH וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> has become לִ֖י לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH3444> he also is become my salvation
וּשְׁאַבְתֶּם־ <WH7579> shall ye draw מַ֖יִם <WH4325> water בְּשָׂשׂ֑וֹן <WH8342> Therefore with joy מִמַּעַיְנֵ֖י <WH4599> out of the wells הַיְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH3444> of salvation

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֞ם <WH559> shall ye say בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he הוֹד֤וּ <WH3034> Praise לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3069> God קִרְא֣וּ <WH7121> call בִשְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> upon his name הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <WH3045> declare בָֽעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> among the people עֲלִֽילֹתָ֑יו <WH5949> his doings הַזְכִּ֕ירוּ <WH2142> make mention כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִשְׂגָּ֖ב <WH7682> is exalted שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> that his name

זַמְּר֣וּ <WH2167> Sing יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> for גֵא֖וּת <WH1348> excellent things עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> for he hath done [מְיֻדַּעַת כ] (מוּדַ֥עַת <WH3045> acknowledge ק) זֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in all the earth

צַהֲלִ֥י <WH6670> Cry out וָרֹ֖נִּי <WH7442> and shout יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> thou inhabitant צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> of Zion כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For גָד֥וֹל <WH1419> for great בְּקִרְבֵּ֖ךְ <WH7130> in the midst קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> [is] the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ
